remarks: A substitution does not change the value of constant substrings. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2016.)
statement:
mrsubccat.s $e |- S = ( mRSubst ` T ) $.
mrsubccat.r $e |- R = ( mREx ` T ) $.
mrsubcn.v $e |- V = ( mVR ` T ) $.
mrsubcn.c $e |- C = ( mCN ` T ) $.
mrsubcn $p |- ( ( F e. ran S /\ X e. ( C \ V ) ) -> ( F ` <" X "> ) = <" X "> ) $.
